title: Bitcoin Whale Wakes Up After 11 Years, Moves $BTC After it Appreciated Over 700,000%
description: In an unexpected move, a dormant Bitcoin ($BTC) whale that hadn’t touched their funds in over 11 years has suddenly resurfaced, with a transactions of 1,037.42 BTC worth over $37.8 million to a new addresses. The transaction, according to on-chain monitoring service Lookonchain, saw the whale move the funds that it first received back in […]

title: Economist Analyzes Challenges of BRICS Currency Competing With US Dollar
description: An economist has shared her analysis of how a common BRICS currency could compete with the U.S. dollar. “You need foreign exchange reserves and you need the trust of the investment community,” she explained, noting that the only country in the BRICS economic bloc to carry such a reserve currency was China. Economist on Chinese […]

title: Crypto Analyst Lays Out 2025 Solana (SOL) Price Target, Updates Outlook on Chainlink (LINK)
description:
A widely followed crypto analyst thinks the Ethereum (ETH) competitor Solana (SOL) will rise more than 10x at some point in 2025. The pseudonymous crypto trader Inmortal tells his 194,800 Twitter followers that SOL will likely be priced at $250 at some point in 2025. At time of writing, SOL is trading for $23.34, suggesting […]
